caption.body: NOW PLAYING: First-time filmmaker Muna Al Hariri, a resident of Jordan’s Azraq Refugee Camp, expresses her need to be a normal teenager while sharing her hopes and dreams in this expressionistic film produced during a media workshop for Syrian girls.  See “Dreams Without Borders” by Muna Al Hariri, now playing in the Video Arts Room located pre-security in the International Terminal
caption.excerpt: NOW PLAYING: First-time filmmaker Muna Al Hariri, a resident of Jordan’s Azraq Refugee Camp, expresses her need to be a normal teenager while sharing her hopes and dreams in this expressionistic film produced during a media workshop for Syrian girls.
